                   int customerContact,

                   java.util.Calendar arrivalTime,

        Parameters:
        customerName - Name of customer who made the reservation
        customerContact - Contact number of customer
        numPax - Number of expected people for this reservation
        arrivalTime - Time customer is expected to arrive
        reserveTable - Table reserved for this reservation
